abstract.t: Redundancy Protection is a generalized protection mechanism to achieve high reliability of service transmission in Segment Routing network. The mechanism uses the "Live-Live" methodology, with the aim of enhancing the functionalities of Segment Routing over IPv6. Inspired by DetNet Packet Replication and Packet Elimination functions, this document introduces two new Segments to provide replication and elimination functions on specific network nodes by leveraging SRv6 Segment programming capabilities.
